  • Method Details

    • getCanvas

      public static Canvas getCanvas()
      Factory method to get the canvas singleton object.

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Set the canvas visibility and brings canvas to the front of screen when made visible. This method can also be used to bring an already visible canvas to the front of other windows.
      Parameters:
      visible - boolean value representing the desired visibility of the canvas (true or false)

    • draw

      public void draw(Object referenceObject, String color, Shape shape)
      Draw a given shape onto the canvas. Enhanced to work with both legacy shapes and new Shape hierarchy.
      Parameters:
      referenceObject - an object to define identity for this shape
      color - the color of the shape
      shape - the shape object to be drawn on the canvas

    • draw

      public void draw(Shape shapeObject)
      Enhanced draw method that works directly with our refactored Shape objects. This method automatically extracts the geometric shape and color.
      Parameters:
      shapeObject - The Shape object from our hierarchy (Circle, Rectangle, Triangle)

    • erase

      public void erase(Object referenceObject)
      Erase a given shape from the screen.
      Parameters:
      referenceObject - the shape object to be erased

    • setForegroundColor

      public void setForegroundColor(String colorString)
      Set the foreground colour of the Canvas. Enhanced version with support for more colors and case-insensitive matching.
      Parameters:
      colorString - the new colour for the foreground of the Canvas

    • wait

      public void wait(int milliseconds)
      Wait for a specified number of milliseconds before finishing. This provides an easy way to specify a small delay which can be used when producing animations.
      Parameters:
      milliseconds - the number of milliseconds to wait

    • getSize

      public Dimension getSize()
      Get the current size of the canvas.
      Returns:
      Dimension object with width and height

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the entire canvas.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor(String colorString)
      Set the background color of the canvas.
      Parameters:
      colorString - The new background color

    • getShapeCount

      public int getShapeCount()
      Get the number of shapes currently on the canvas.
      Returns:
      Number of shapes

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Check if the canvas is currently visible.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false otherwise

    • getAllShapes

      public List<Object> getAllShapes()
      Get all shapes currently on the canvas.
      Returns:
      List of all shape objects

    • removeShapesByType

      public void removeShapesByType(Class<?> shapeType)
      Remove all shapes of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      shapeType - The class type to remove

    • highlightShape

      public void highlightShape(Object referenceObject, String borderColor)
      Highlight a specific shape by drawing a border around it.
      Parameters:
      referenceObject - The shape to highlight
      borderColor - The color of the border

    • drawText

      public void drawText(String text, int x, int y, String color)
      Add text to the canvas at specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      color - Text color

    • drawGrid

      public void drawGrid(int spacing, String color)
      Draw a grid on the canvas to help with positioning.
      Parameters:
      spacing - Grid spacing in pixels
      color - Grid color

    • close

      public void close()
      Close the canvas window.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Set the title of the canvas window.
      Parameters:
      title - New title for the window

    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      Resize the canvas to new dimensions.
      Parameters:
      width - New width
      height - New height
